columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the image

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify a image uniquely

columns.name: type
columns.description: Type of the resource

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The provisioning state of the image resource

columns.name: hyper_v_generation
columns.description: Gets the HyperVGenerationType of the VirtualMachine created from the image

columns.name: source_virtual_machine_id
columns.description: Contains the id of the virtual machine

columns.name: storage_profile_os_disk_blob_uri
columns.description: Contains uri of the virtual hard disk

columns.name: storage_profile_os_disk_caching
columns.description: Specifies the caching requirements

columns.name: storage_profile_os_disk_encryption_set
columns.description: Specifies the customer managed disk encryption set resource id for the managed image disk

columns.name: storage_profile_os_disk_managed_disk_id
columns.description: Contains the id of the managed disk

columns.name: storage_profile_os_disk_size_gb
columns.description: Specifies the size of empty data disks in gigabytes

columns.name: storage_profile_os_disk_snapshot_id
columns.description: Contains the id of the snapshot

columns.name: storage_profile_os_disk_storage_account_type
columns.description: Specifies the storage account type for the managed disk

columns.name: storage_profile_os_disk_state
columns.description: Contains state of the OS

columns.name: storage_profile_os_disk_type
columns.description: Specifies the type of the OS that is included in the disk if creating a VM from a custom image

columns.name: storage_profile_zone_resilient
columns.description: Specifies whether an image is zone resilient or not

columns.name: storage_profile_data_disks
columns.description: A list of parameters that are used to add a data disk to a virtual machine

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
